name: hook-style
description: Style and theme your React components with Hooks

scripts.example:watch: microbundle watch --define process.env.NODE_ENV=development --entry example/src/index.tsx --globals react=React,react-dom=ReactDOM --format umd --jsx React.createElement --output example/dist/bundle.js
scripts.watch: npm run clean && microbundle watch --define process.env.NODE_ENV=development --format cjs,es
scripts.build: npm run clean && microbundle --define process.env.NODE_ENV=production --format cjs,es --sourcemap=false
